meanings.sent1: She warmed her hands by the fire.
meanings.sent2: The sun warmed the earth in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat warmed up to the new blanket quickly.
meanings.sent4: His smile warmed her heart like a cozy fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The hot tea warmed her from the inside out.

meanings.sent1: He warmed the soup on the stove.
meanings.sent2: The heater quickly warmed the room.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a beach vacation warmed his spirits.
meanings.sent4: Her words warmed the atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The campfire warmed their chilly bodies after a long hike.
